All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, FindAndReplaceServer, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable
public class FijiTextArea
extends EditTextArea
implements javax.swing.Scrollable, FindAndReplaceServer

The text area for free-form FIJI input and output.
